title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - EverCommerce’s Secret to AI-Ready, Multi-Brand Data (ANT101)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - EverCommerce 实现 AI 就绪多品牌数据的秘诀 (ANT101)
abstract:
EverCommerce, a parent company of 50+ independently operated brands, began their data journey with decentralized, brand-specific analytics. As the demand for cross-brand visibility and AI-powered use cases grew, they leveraged Fivetran as the foundation of a major re-platforming effort - shifting from fragmented AWS infrastructure to a centralized Amazon S3 data lake architecture. 

In this session, discover how EverCommerce consolidated siloed systems, standardized marketing data across brands, and reduced manual effort of onboarding new brands with Fivetran’s automated data movement. Learn how this unified data foundation now enables AI workloads like predictive analytics and intelligent personalization across the organization. This presentation is brought to you by Fivetran, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn:
EverCommerce是一家拥有50多个独立运营品牌的母公司,其数据之旅始于分散的、特定品牌的分析。随着跨品牌可见性和AI驱动用例需求的增长,他们利用Fivetran作为重大平台重构工作的基础——从分散的AWS基础设施转向集中式Amazon S3数据湖架构。

在本次会议中,了解EverCommerce如何整合孤立系统,跨品牌标准化营销数据,并通过Fivetran的自动化数据迁移减少新品牌接入的手动工作。了解这一统一数据基础现在如何在整个组织中支持AI工作负载,如预测分析和智能个性化。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴Fivetran提供。
